nodes.text: Antipose XII was a planet located in the Centrality, a sector of the Outer Rim Territories.
Antipose XII was a sparsely populated planet that was described as having the "most violet skies in the universe." Its inhabitants used the term "dubesor" as an insult.
Sometime before the Galactic Civil War, the pleasure yacht Arleen ran year-long tours from the Oseon system to Antipose IX and Antipose XII.
Antipose XII was first mentioned in Lando Calrissian and the Flamewind of Oseon, a 1983 book written by L. Neil Smith.
